name: HAZAMA_QUEEN
description:
Gameplay

.

HAZAMA QUEEN is a high-speed & rogue light FPS.
Use your "YAMI(japanese-complex-sickness) right hand" to deliver powerful blows and your switchable left-hand weapon to conquer the demon-infested hell!
Keep on defeating enemies and sucking the "YAMI" or Mary will instantly be dead!

.

The lever-action rifle is a Girl's Best Friend!
While reloading, fire a mighty blow with your right-hand, and keep the demons at bay with your incessant attacks!

.

Grab the raw head of the "Circle Crasher"(Women who participate in all-male gatherings often appear in Japanese university clubs, destroying relationships) by the scruff of the neck and release the YAMI!
Can you master these weapons of habit?

Story

.
In the year 202X, the world is enveloped in "YAMI"!
Demons overflow onto the earth, and people are just waiting to be overrun and exterminated!
Then, one of the make-up girls, who is a JI-RAI-K(Google jiraikei girl!), decides to storm into hell and finish off the Demon King!

You become the cute & serious & cute & crazy mine girl, Skewer Mary!
You must conquer hell to save the world from the "sickness"!

Character

..
Mary the Skewer.
The 36th generation of "YAMINCHU”.
The 36th generation of "YAMINCHU" is a special group of warriors who deal with "YAMI" passed down from generation to generation.
They have been fighting against demons who target people's "YAMI" in the shadows of history.

Mary is the most pop-YAMI person because she has been dealing with sickness in a natural way.
She has the highest tolerance for the YAMI of all generations.
In battle, she was cut down and her right hand was immediately thrust into the brain of a demon.
She is now known as "Skewer Mary. By the way, she is 20 years old
